inapplicable.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

inapplicable.help: Buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.help: Form elements must have labels

inapplicable.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

rules.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique
rules.help: accesskey attribute value should be unique

rules.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
rules.help: Active <area> elements must have alternate text

rules.description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
rules.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

rules.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
rules.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

rules.description: Ensure aria-braillelabel and aria-brailleroledescription have a non-braille equivalent
rules.help: aria-braille attributes must have a non-braille equivalent

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
rules.help: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

rules.description: Ensures elements do not use deprecated roles
rules.help: Deprecated ARIA roles must not be used

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures aria-hidden="true" is not present on the document body.
rules.help: aria-hidden="true" must not be present on the document body

rules.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
rules.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
rules.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

rules.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
rules.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

rules.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
rules.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

rules.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
rules.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

rules.description: Ensure aria-roledescription is only used on elements with an implicit or explicit role
rules.help: aria-roledescription must be on elements with a semantic role

rules.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
rules.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

rules.description: Ensures role="text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants
rules.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
rules.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
rules.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

rules.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
rules.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

rules.description: Ensures <audio> elements have captions
rules.help: <audio> elements must have a captions track

rules.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
rules.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

rules.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
rules.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

rules.description: Ensures <blink> elements are not used
rules.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

rules.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
rules.help: Buttons must have discernible text

rules.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
rules.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

rules.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AAA enhanced contrast ratio thresholds
rules.help: Elements must meet enhanced color contrast ratio thresholds

rules.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
rules.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

rules.description: Ensures content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations
rules.help: CSS Media queries must not lock display orientation

rules.description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly
rules.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

rules.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
rules.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

rules.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
rules.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

rules.description: Ensures every id attribute value of active elements is unique
rules.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

rules.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
rules.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

rules.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
rules.help: id attribute value must be unique

rules.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
rules.help: Headings should not be empty

rules.description: Ensures table headers have discernible text
rules.help: Table header text should not be empty

rules.description: Ensures elements in the focus order have a role appropriate for interactive content
rules.help: Elements in the focus order should have an appropriate role

rules.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
rules.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

rules.description: Ensures <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
rules.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

rules.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
rules.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

rules.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
rules.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

rules.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
rules.help: Frames must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
rules.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

rules.description: Informs users about hidden content.
rules.help: Hidden content on the page should be analyzed

rules.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
rules.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

rules.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
rules.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

rules.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
rules.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

rules.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
rules.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

rules.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
rules.help: Images must have alternate text

rules.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
rules.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

rules.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
rules.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

rules.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
rules.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

rules.description: Ensures that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
rules.help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

rules.description: Ensures that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
rules.help: Form elements should have a visible label

rules.description: Ensures every form element has a label
rules.help: Form elements must have labels

rules.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
rules.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

rules.description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
rules.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

rules.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
rules.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

rules.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
rules.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

rules.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
rules.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

rules.description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
rules.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

rules.description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
rules.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

rules.description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
rules.help: Document should have one main landmark

rules.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
rules.help: Ensures landmarks are unique

rules.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
rules.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

rules.description: Ensures links have discernible text
rules.help: Links must have discernible text

rules.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
rules.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

rules.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
rules.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

rules.description: Ensures <marquee> elements are not used
rules.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

rules.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
rules.help: Delayed refresh must not be used

rules.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
rules.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

rules.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
rules.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

rules.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
rules.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

rules.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
rules.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

rules.description: Ensures <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
rules.help: <video> or <audio> elements must not play automatically

rules.description: Ensures <object> elements have alternate text
rules.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

rules.description:
Ensure bold, italic text and font-size is not used to style

elements as a heading
rules.help:
Styled

elements must not be used as headings

rules.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
rules.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

rules.description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
rules.help: Ensure elements marked as presentational are consistently ignored

rules.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
rules.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

rules.description: Ensures [role="img"] elements have alternate text
rules.help: [role="img"] elements must have an alternative text

rules.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
rules.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

rules.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
rules.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

rules.description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
rules.help: Select element must have an accessible name

rules.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
rules.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

rules.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
rules.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

rules.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
rules.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

rules.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
rules.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

rules.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
rules.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

rules.description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.
rules.help: Data or header cells must not be used to give caption to a data table.

rules.description: Ensure touch target have sufficient size and space
rules.help: All touch targets must be 24px large, or leave sufficient space

rules.description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a <table> larger than 3 by 3  has one or more table headers
rules.help: Non-empty <td> elements in larger <table> must have an associated table header

rules.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
rules.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

rules.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
rules.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

rules.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
rules.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

rules.description: Ensures <video> elements have captions
rules.help: <video> elements must have captions
